title: AI Fundamentals Guide
shortDescription: Complete guide to artificial intelligence fundamentals and neural networks
description:
A comprehensive 150-page guide covering AI basics, neural networks, deep learning architectures, and practical applications.

Perfect for beginners and intermediate learners who want to understand the foundations of artificial intelligence.

What You'll Learn:

  • AI history and evolution
  • Machine learning algorithms
  • Neural network architectures
  • Deep learning frameworks
  • Practical implementation examples

title: React Admin Dashboard Template
shortDescription: Modern React admin dashboard with 50+ components and dark mode
description:
A beautiful, fully responsive admin dashboard template built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

Features:

  • 50+ pre-built components
  • Dark/Light mode
  • Multiple chart types
  • Authentication pages
  • Responsive design
  • Clean, modern UI

Includes complete documentation and code examples.

title: Python Web Scraping Toolkit
shortDescription: Professional web scraping scripts with BeautifulSoup and Selenium
description:
Complete toolkit for web scraping with Python including ready-to-use scripts for common scraping tasks.

Includes:

  • 10+ scraping scripts
  • Proxy rotation support
  • Data export to CSV/JSON
  • Anti-detection measures
  • Comprehensive documentation

Perfect for data collection, research, and automation projects.

title: Machine Learning Masterclass
shortDescription: Complete ML course from basics to advanced deep learning (20+ hours)
description:
Master machine learning with this comprehensive video course covering everything from basics to advanced topics.

Course Content:

  • 20+ hours of video content
  • 50+ coding exercises
  • Real-world projects
  • Supervised & Unsupervised Learning
  • Deep Learning with TensorFlow
  • Model deployment

Includes lifetime access and certificate of completion.

title: VS Code AI Assistant Extension
shortDescription: AI-powered code completion and refactoring extension for VS Code
description:
Supercharge your coding with AI-powered suggestions, code completion, and intelligent refactoring.

Features:

  • Intelligent code completion
  • Automated refactoring
  • Code explanation
  • Bug detection
  • Multi-language support
  • Custom AI model integration

Compatible with VS Code 1.80+

title: Chatbot Consultation Service
shortDescription: Professional AI chatbot development and integration consultation
description:
Get expert consultation for building and integrating AI chatbots into your business.

Service Includes:

  • Initial consultation call (1 hour)
  • Custom chatbot design
  • Integration planning
  • Technology recommendations
  • Implementation roadmap
  • Follow-up support

Perfect for businesses looking to implement conversational AI.
